# [Interview #1115: Firefight Tour - El Cerrito, CA, Entry #25](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1115#25)

#### Question

Will you tell us the Intent of Bavadin’s Shard?

#### Brandon Sanderson

The Intent of Bavadin’s Shard? No. But good question. Have a RAFO card.
